item.title: Donator Points
item.dc:creator: @Saige Saige
item.description:
@Saige wrote:

Ok, im trying to add donator points to my server. Im useing this guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=522746.0 but i get this error

3328r2w.png1024×600

Here are the things i added please send them back fixed thanks! if (playerCommand.startsWith("givepoints")) { try { final String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); final String otherplayer = args[1]; final int point = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); for (final Player player : PlayerHandler.players) { if (player != null) { if (player.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(otherplayer)) { final Client c2 = (Client) player; c2.donorPoints += point; //CHANGE THIS TO YOUR DONOR POINTS VARIABLE c.sendMessage("@blu@You have given " + otherplayer + ", " + point + " Reward points."); c2.sendMessage("@red@You have been given " + point + " Reward points by " + c.playerName + "."); } } } } catch (final Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Wrong syntax! ::givepoints name amount"); } }

Read full topic
